Package FX.Model.Entities.Brick

Class Brick

java.lang.Object
FX.Model.Entities.Entities
FX.Model.Entities.Brick.Brick
Direct Known Subclasses:
CementBrick, ClayBrick, ReinforcedSteelBrick, SteelBrick
public abstract class Brick
extends Entities
This class is an abstract class which is going to be used for implementation. (Model.Brick.CementBrick, Model.Brick.ClayBrick, Model.Brick.SteelBrick, Model.Brick.ReinforcedSteelBrick)

  • Constructor Details

    • Brick

      public Brick​(javafx.geometry.Point2D pos, javafx.geometry.Dimension2D size, javafx.scene.paint.Color border, javafx.scene.paint.Color inner, int strength, double hitProbability, java.lang.String brickName)
      this method is used to create a brick object.
      Parameters:
      pos - the position of the brick
      size - the size of the break
      border - the color of the brick border
      inner - the inside color of brick
      strength - the strength of the brick. (how many hits can it take before it break)
      hitProbability - this is the probability where the brick is going to get damaged.
      brickName - this is the name of the brick, which is used to determine which audio to play when collision occurs.

  • Method Details

      public boolean setImpact​(javafx.geometry.Point2D point, int dir)
      this method is used to determine whether the brick should be broken or draw a crack on the brick.
      Overrides:
      setImpact in class Entities
      Parameters:
      point - the point where the ball comes in contact to
      dir - the direction where the ball comes in contact with the object.
      Returns:
      returns a boolean value negative if the brick is broken, true if it is not.
